title: Jehu Wipes Out Ahab’s Line
summary: Jehu kills all 70 of Ahab’s sons, fulfilling God's judgment. He also deceives and kills the worshipers of Baal, destroying the temple of Baal. Although Jehu purges idolatry, he does not fully follow God’s law and retains the golden calves in Israel.

faq.question: How did Jehu fulfill God’s judgment against Ahab’s family?
faq.answer: By executing all of Ahab’s descendants and officials.

faq.question: Did Jehu fully obey God?
faq.answer: No, he removed Baal worship but kept the golden calves of Jeroboam.
